TopicTitle: Rureglathon's Video Tutorials - A big list of tutorials and a place to request more!

Articles.Content:
Hey guys and gals, this post will hopefully act as a list/hub for all my KSP tutorials. I have 50 or so at the moment, and I make more all the time, covering things from using maneuver nodes to travelling to Laythe.

Historical Spaceflight Tutorials - Some are based off the ones on the wiki:

How to recreate the Sputnik 1:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7Qg0NyRL3Eg

How to recreate the Vostok 1:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iESUAXs56OU

How to recreate the Gemini 6A and 7 (Part 1)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jM2Zmnppw9w

How to recreate the Gemini 6A and 7 (Part 2)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1NDzTjefCEc

How to recreate the Gemini 6A and 7 (Part 3)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pWvnNiksXuk

How to recreate the Luna 9:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=llR7MMumj9I

How to recreate Apollo 11 (Part 1):

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ylx6_ZpAkxA

How to recreate Apollo 11 (Part 2):

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aEo_NzlDrbY

How to recreate the Curiosity Rover to Mars:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u6zyU9FYXHk

Other Tutorials:

Taking 3 Kerbals to the Mun and back:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zm_OSo-iDJo

In-Depth beginner's guide:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0XbB-CmA4mI

How to launch your first space station:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L_Ft7DWSpxk

How to perform a gravity assist:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LA-FTqfuXrI

How to take a rover to the Mun:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pBvK6A0AMwQ

How to land at KSC

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=euuhK_aTdBg

How to set up and use Action Groups:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bbT-w7qwVo0

How to travel to Laythe:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ow16Q4t0n1g

How to get a free return trajectory:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1xF5B-ahH-8

How to dock:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cpZwQJBX8lM

How to design, build and fly good SSTOs:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zy1JrnNUmwg

How to go to Eve:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wZeod8X-EQk

How to go to the Mun:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QAA6Z_Iy7hM

How to get into a geosynchronous orbit:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2H4178jalh8

How to set up and use Asparagus Staging:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rKGfwr2vrew

How to build your first rocket:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kfhVtwTOR2E

How to get the perfect orbit with the maneuver tool:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XVQHYeTn_5Q

Tell me if any of the links are wrong, and please do suggest more tutorials if you need any help, and I always read all the comments on my videos too. I have more tutorials on my channel, but some of them are for mods etc, so I thought I'd leave them out of this. I hope you guys find this useful!

Edited September 14, 2013 by Rureglathon
